short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Oncourse extension for connecting sales navigator LinkedIn profiles!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The primary function of this plugin is to have users the ability to send out a connection request or message in LinkedIn and be able to schedule sequences created in the OnCourse CRM.

This feature will allow the sales team to add other profiles to a sequence that would help in generating new leads.

Check out our site for information: https://www.tryoncourse.com
